data.name: Trainz 2022 DLC - Pacific National 92 and 93 Class Locomotives
data.detailed_description:
The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed by UGL Rail and built at the Broadmeadow factory. It is operated by a number of rail freight operators. The design is based on the National Rail NR class but with some modifications and upgraded features. This specific pack includes 92 and 93 classes covering all liveries including the primer livery which was used during trials.

These locomotives include:

Changeable Weathering Options
Custom Cab
Opening & Closing Engine Doors
Opening & Closing Cab Doors
Opening & Closing Windows
Changeable Unit Numbers (for coal trains)
Changeable Marker Light Formations
ILR Holder Toggle On/Off
Numberboard Light On/Off
Crew On/Off
Emmisive Headlights & Ditchlights
Hood, Step & Coupler Lights On/Off
Blinds Raised/Lowered

data.short_description: Drive the modern Pacific National 92 and 93 class diesel locomotives!
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian, French, German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
